# those lines shall be generated by cxx-maven-plugin :
function(ADD_CMAKE_DEPENDENCIES target)
    # CMAKE DEPENDENCIES MANAGMENT
    # Both maven and cmake dependencies management system can be used at the same time
    # this is how it works :
    # BEGIN CMAKE_DEPENDENCIES
    # If a "ModuleB" target has been define, this means we are building an amalgamed cmake project
    # but maven dependencies can be used too
    if(TARGET ModuleB)
        message("Adding direct ModuleB cmake dependencies to target '${target}'")
        target_link_libraries(${target} ModuleB)
    endif()
    # END CMAKE_DEPENDENCIES
endfunction(ADD_CMAKE_DEPENDENCIES)
